subtitle: These delicious salmon fillets, coated in a sherry, soy sauce and ginger glaze, are cooked with prawns. Ideal for entertaining!

method.text: Heat the butter in a frying pan. Cook the salmon and prawns gently for 6-8 min, turning the salmon half way through.
Meanwhile, simmer the soy sauce, sherry, sugar and ginger together, until the mixture starts to become syrupy.
Brush the salmon with the sauce. Sprinkle with coriander. Cook for a further 1-2 min. Serve.

title: Saucy glazed salmon
